name: Popeyes Runner
description:
Its a 2D running game in which you must survive as most as posible! Inspired By Flappy Bird and Tiny Wings. In the game healthy food will help you gain energy that you need to jump and avoid obstacles. But in the other hand junk food will stole your energy.  So use your energy wisely and run as far as you can! 

IMPORTANT USE SPACE BAR TO JUMP!!

Good Luck!
